Sandwich Toaster with Adjustable Grill Height: This sandwich toaster would have an adjustable grill height that allows users to adjust the toasting time and temperature to their preference. This feature would ensure that the bread is toasted evenly and the sandwich is cooked to perfection.

Sandwich Toaster with Built-in Egg Cooker: This sandwich toaster would have a built-in egg cooker that allows users to cook eggs in various styles (poached, scrambled, or boiled) while the sandwich is toasting. This feature would save time and effort for users who enjoy having eggs with their sandwiches.

Sandwich Toaster with Multi-Level Grilling: This sandwich toaster would have multiple levels that allow users to grill multiple sandwiches at the same time. This feature would be ideal for families or busy individuals who need to make multiple sandwiches at once.

Sandwich Toaster with Digital Display: This sandwich toaster would have a digital display that allows users to select their preferred settings (toasting time, temperature, and style) with ease. This feature would make it easier for users to make the perfect sandwich every time.

Sandwich Toaster with Automatic Ejection: This sandwich toaster would have an automatic ejection feature that releases the sandwich when it is fully toasted. This feature would prevent the sandwich from burning and make it easier to retrieve the sandwich from the toaster.
